listing.listing_description: Sunshine gilds the polished concrete floors at this industrial-chic residence just outside downtown Melbourne. The villa’s architectural bona fides show through in its airy ceilings and light-filled bedrooms. Catch contemporary art at Abbotsford Convent and feed animals at Collingwood Children’s Farm, or take the train into the city.This vacation rental opens to a private backyard with a gas barbecue, alfresco dining for 6, and a patch of greenery shaded by a neighboring tree. Inside, you’ll find a satellite TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi, and a Nespresso machine, along with hidden-yet-thoughtful details like heated bathroom floors.An expanse of polished concrete links the sitting area, where a cognac leather sectional invites you to lounge under the high ceilings, with the open-plan dining area and fully equipped kitchen. There’s more seating at the kitchen’s breakfast bar, along with views of a courtyard garden. Primary-color accent pillows, geometric artwork, and natural-wood accents add playful touches of warmth to the streamlined space.This luxury property has 1 bedroom on the ground floor and 2 upstairs, laid out around a family room. The ground-floor bedroom has a queen bed, access to a hall bathroom, and a door to the courtyard off the kitchen. Upstairs, there’s a master bedroom with a king bed and ensuite bathroom. There is also a room with a queen bed and shared access to a hallway bathroom with the kids' room, containing two twin beds.The villa is a short walk from Abbotsford Convent, a one-of-a-kind venue with galleries, gardens, and eateries in a former convent, as well as Collingwood Children’s Farm, where young Australians can help brush cows and cuddle guinea pigs. It’s a 10-minute drive or less to the 64-acre Fitzroy Gardens, Melbourne Cricket Ground, and the city’s array of world-class coffee shops, honeymoon-worthy restaurants and intriguing boutiques where you can pick up holiday souvenirs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

listing.listing_description: This four-bedroom vacation home is nestled in a secret corner of Bali’s bumping Seminyak district and can offer eight fortunate travelers a chance to see Indonesia’s ‘Island of the Gods’ from the comfort of a well developed strip of land, while remaining in proximity Bali’s natural beauty. Designed by Indonesia’s own Budi Pradono, Villa Issi is an amazing example of contemporary architecture blending seamlessly with its laidback tropical surroundings. Simply stated, there could be no better choice than Villa Issi to start off an exciting Balinese expedition.Villa Issi is ideal for bon vivants. Guests are invited to sit back and let the estate’s staff chef, butler and housekeeper take care of things, while they indulge in the eighty-foot emerald green swimming pool. The estate also boasts a fitness facility as well as a gourmet barbeque for sumptuous meals at the alfresco dining table. Indoors, guests can enjoy the big screen television and the Bose sound system.The design found in this home is nothing short of phenomenal. There is a stunning artistic metal sculpture that wraps around the top floor and provides shade for two of the bedrooms. The living room has a monochromatic color scheme with soft, vibrantly colored furnishings, producing a great contrasting effect. There is also a very unique, timber bridge that extends from the upper-floor deck over the swimming pool.Two bedrooms are located on the upper floor in the main house and the other two can be found in the separate guest house. Each bedroom has plush king size beds and en-suite bathrooms with alfresco features. Additionally, every room has a separate entrance to the terrace, except for the master suite, which has its own balcony and scenic views.Villa Issi is within walking distance of the busy streets of Seminyak, full of charming vendors who love to haggle over their exotic wares. High-end restaurants can also be found here, or as they’re called on this island, a warung, as well as hip beach clubs full of lively people. If you’re looking for some cultural authenticity, the iconic Tanah Lot temple is a mere thirty minutes away, providing the dramatic scene of an ancient temple that literally rises out from the sea atop a rock archway.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

The beach is more popular with locals than tourists (not safe for swimming in most sections), but is a great spot for building sandcastles or to watch the sunset as you sip a cocktail from one of the many beachside bars.

listing.listing_description: Wake up early to watch the surfers catch their morning waves at this modern beachside apartment on the prestigious shores of Noosa Main Beach on Australia’s east coast. Have a quick breakfast on the terrace, maybe a “wake-up” dip the shared pool, and then take a few steps off the estate to the warm white sand. After you’ve spent some time working on your tan, head inland to downtown Noosa.Sleek and stylish white interiors give this suite an elegant vibe, while touches of rustic wood and ocean-inspired art remind you to keep it light and relax in this breezy setting. Open concept design means you can watch a movie on the couch, make yourself a snack in the kitchen, and sit down to a family meal, and the ocean view is just a head turn away. This beachside suite comes with everything you’ll need to host special family dinners, casual barbeques, and late nights with friends. If you’re not feeling social, find a shady spot on the balcony to catch up on some reading or find a rugby match on the Smart TV. La Mer comes with 1 parking spot and shared access to their ocean-view swimming pool and hot tub. On one side, you’ve got Noosa Main Beach. On the other, an eclectic mix of cafes, art galleries, and restaurant/bars on the always buzzing Hastings Street. Before you venture out bar hopping, earn it with a hike through Noosa National Park, a round of golf at Peregian, or a walk across Forty Mile Beach. For dinner, Noosa Boathouse offers incredible views from its rooftop lounge on the river.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Taman Ahimsa translates to ‘Garden of Peace,’ an apt name for this luxury villa, as visitors will attest to the estate’s abundant tropical gardens featuring fruit-bearing trees and vibrantly colored plants. Situated on a beachfront strip of the Cemagi coast in southwestern Bali, the estate offers accommodations for up to fourteen visitors in its seven regal guest suites featuring many natural components. Taman Ahimsa itself is a microcosm of Bali, a place of beauty where questions you never knew you had will be answered.Most people are used to chlorinated pools, but guests staying at Taman Ahimsa will get to experience the rare pleasure of swimming in an ionized pool, which – above all else – will be a healthier experience. The sundeck is a multipurpose area great for lounging around, or engaging in yoga and martial arts. The estate provides guests with canoes, bicycles and even a telescope for some inspired stargazing. Indoors, the villa features the latest in entertainment technology, with multiple units spread throughout the home, and Wi-Fi access.The villa uses organic materials for building components that further enhance the tropical ambience created by the natural surroundings. This approach is accomplished through the high-vaulted ceilings made of grass-thatched roofs, the rattan furniture, the natural stone and the bamboo veneers as well as Indonesian artworks and ornate Balinese fabrics. The gourmet kitchen features a juicer, blender and coffee maker to get your mornings done right.Each of the seven guest suites at Taman Ahimsa have whimsical names after the various chakras or energy points found in Hinduism. Each room has a king size bed, a full and luxurious en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, fans, stereo, security safes and private terraces. Four of the five rooms on the first level have beautiful alfresco showers – a truly refreshing experience!The south of Bali has almost too many fantastic sites to experience in one trip alone. Luckily Taman Ahimsa is in proximity to Nirwana Golf Course, one of the most esteemed courses in the whole of Asia. The course is adjacent to Tanah Lot, a mystical sea temple revered by the Balinese and open to visitors. For a bit more excitement, be sure to check out nearby Seminyak and indulge in its spirited nightlife, delicious restaurants and ample shopping. The splendors of Bali await!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Named for the ancient Sanskrit word for ‘peace,’ Samadhana offers a true escape to the Balinese countryside. Set on nearly two acres of professionally designed gardens in the seaside village of Ketewel, the villa is a private retreat, but within a short drive of Sanur and Ubud. With staff including a chef and butler and five bedrooms spread out between a master suite pavilion, main house and guest house, the property is perfect for special events, family vacations and romantic getaways alike.The villa’s gorgeous outdoor spaces mean you can enjoy Bali’s tropical climate in luxury. Open-sided living and dining pavilions let the breezes waft through, and a terrace with chaise longues, daybeds and ocean views is a sunny spot to lounge by the 25-meter lap pool. There’s a barbecue for al-fresco meals, an outdoor shower for post-swim rinses, and an outdoor bar and pool table for entertainment. Inside, Samadhana has a sound system, telephone for local calls, Wi-Fi and air conditioning.The airy outdoor living spaces have contemporary furnishings with traditional Balinese style, from teak dining sets to sumptuous daybeds. The interiors are a bit more eclectic, with wicker sofas, clean-lined tables and shelves and shoji-inspired screens creating privacy. Vaulted ceilings throughout add to the sense of spaciousness. The fully equipped galley-style kitchen has storage and appliances concealed behind sleek pale wood paneling.To ensure comfort, all bedrooms at Samadhana have air conditioning and ceiling fans. The separate master bedroom pavilion has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, separate garden bathroom with outdoor shower, sitting area, a balcony and ocean views. The main house has two bedrooms that share a bathroom and have balcony access; one has a queen bed and the other has two twin beds. The guest house has two bedrooms with queen beds, en-suite bathrooms, sitting areas and balcony access.From the villa, it’s a 13 km drive to Sanur, 7 km to the Bali Safari, Marine Park and Sukawati Art Market, 13 km to Kuta, 14 km to Waterbom Bali Waterslides, 17 km to Ubud and 24 km to Seminyak. Head to Jalan Petitenget, 19 km away, for restaurants and shopping or Nirwana Bali Golf Course, 10 km away, for a round. The closest beach is Pabean, a 5-minute walk away; Legian Beach is 15 km away and Seminyak Beach is 16 km away. The Ngurah Rai International Airport is about 27 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: The stretch of beach between Sanur and Ketewel is well known as a surfer’s heaven (especially from November to May, when the winds turn offshore on this side of the island), but beginners should beware of strong, swirling currents. Good breaks can be found at Keramas, Ketewel and Cucukan.

Just off the mainland are the islands of Nusa Lembongan and Nusa Penida – both famous for their scuba diving and snorkeling, with excellent dive sites and rich marine life. Boat trips from Sanur or Padangbai can easily be arranged. Further along the east coast, Amed and Tulamben offer isolated reefs – the latter, also has shipwreck diving.

An annual international kite festival takes place at Padang Galak beach (just north of Sanur) every July. Traditional Balinese giant kites up to ten meters in length are made and flown competitively by teams from different villages around Bali. Originally, these kites were intended to send a message to the Hindu Gods to create abundant crops and harvests.

listing.listing_description: Leave your worries behind at this tranquil Balinese villa on the northern coast of Kuta. Mature palm trees provide the perfect shady spot to catch up on some reading. If you’re working on a vacation tan, the poolside sunbeds are a great place to stretch out. When you’re ready to explore, start at Tanah Lot, an ancient temple on a rockface in the sea. The view at sunset is incredible.From the carved entrance to the courtyard lawns, Eshara I loves to show off Bali’s lush natural elements. The open-plan layout is further enhanced by wide terrace doors, furnished exterior lounges, and even an alfresco shower. Inside, the decor has a Bohemian vibe, using an eclectic mix of sculptures, artwork, colorful furnishings, and elegant chandeliers to prove that anything goes, as long as you love it. And, a lot of care has gone into the crafting of Eshara I’s unique atmosphere.The villa’s full-staff, including a chef, makes it easy to dine-in, but if you feel like checking out the local restaurants, start on Jalan Raya in Seminyak. Dig your feet into the sand while you sip a tropical cocktail at a beachfront bar or head inland for something more formal. Seminyak Beach is also a perfect place to try surfing or take a lesson.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Umah Daun is an exceptional vacation rental located in the Umalas area of Bali. This private luxury home has been skillfully sculpted from interlinking pavilions arranged in an arc around the grounds. Conceived by noted Balinese architect, Komang Suardika of Jeghier Architect, the villa’s generous living areas appear to extend beyond their glass doors and across the shallow pond that flows around the contours of the pavilion. Experience the best of Bali with Luxury Retreats!Villa Umah Daun offers huge family appeal. Youngsters will gravitate to the beanbag-strewn playroom, wading pool and tree house, while even ‘big kids’ will appreciate the media room, games room, 50-foot swimming pool and adjacent hot tub. There are myriad toys for adults too, among them a Sonos multi-zone sound system and a climate-controlled wine room. Working discreetly behind the scenes, the villa’s nine-strong staff includes an accomplished chef who can whip up tasty meals from an extensive suggestion menu.Emulating the form of the surrounding rice terraces, this villa showcases an uncompromisingly modern design softened with graciously curved walls and use of natural materials such as andesite rock, merbau wood and marble floors and bowed bengkirai wood roofs that bring to mind the leaves for which the villa has been named. The massive dining table will be the focus for many fabulous feasts, while the poolside bale is perfect for less formal meals. And while there’s an abundance of social living space, it’s countered with quiet corners – library, bedroom balconies and a rooftop terrace – to take a break from the crowd.Five stunning and colorful bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking holiday home. All of the whimsically named bedrooms offer king size beds, en-suite bathrooms and ceiling fans. Other perks include a bidet and balcony in the master suite, two suites with lounge areas and two suites with direct terrace access.While Villa Umah Daun represents a world unto itself, guests are only a short drive away from Bali’s famed sunset beaches and Seminyak’s uber-hip boutiques, spas, restaurants and bars. You’ll also find the Nirwana Bali Golf Club within driving distance of this exquisite property. Whether for an unforgettable corporate retreat, an over-the-top honeymoon or an impressive wedding, this villa makes a great bet!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located at the beating heart of up-and-coming Berawa (Canggu), this listing captures a slice of Balinese paradise in a happening seaside town. The sound of falling water and the swaying of vines and palm fronds add to the poolside peacefulness. Guests will enjoy the carved wooden décor and Balinese art worked into a modern interior, with world-class beaches lying just a few minutes away.Guests will soon settle into Villa Elite Cassia with ease. A selection of impressive stone sun loungers provide easy access to the refreshing pool, which is constantly fed by a number of carved waterfalls. Towering palm trees and dangling creepers caress the water's surface, giving the impression of the jungle making its presence felt inside this charming listing. With an impressive array of spacious bedrooms and a banquet-sized dining table under the immaculate exterior gazebo, this is a perfect group choice, with the provided-as-standard butler and chef serving drinks, snacks and scrumptious meals to all guests' specific needs. The Canggu district is especially well-serviced when it comes to food and restaurant options. Guests can feast on delicious and popular local dishes like satays or nasi ayam served from cheerful warungs (small food stalls), or choose from a range of well-regarded established Western, Japanese or international restaurants. A particularly strong cafe culture ensures visitors will find tasty teas, sweet eats and caffeine options abounding. As a beach resort, guests can make the most of access to the pristine local beaches less than five minutes drive away. Take in the shimmer of the sun on the Indian Ocean at the lengthy and excellently-regarded Batu Bolong beach, one of the best of its kind in this part of Bali, with a fantastic reputation for longboarding. Rent a board, swim in the gentle surf or simply lounge in the one of the oceanside cafes with a cold drink, as the impressive stone temple of the Pura Batumejan complex overlooks the tropical scene.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Kemala Villa is a stunning luxury residence in Canggu on the Indonesian island of Bali. Situated on 1,750 square meters of lush estate in the southwest region of Berawa, the villa is a short drive from the stylish town of Seminyak as well as Canggu Beach. Featuring superb outdoor and interior living areas and five deluxe bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, the vacation rental also includes a private chef, butler, property manager, and security guard.The villa's bi-level design includes an expansive ground-level terrace with beautiful swimming pool, along with an ample, upper-level balcony outside adjoining the interior living areas. Savor enchanting days in the South Pacific sun, floating in the pool's lagoon-like waters and sipping cool refreshments on royal-red loungers. Soothe your body with a massage and a dip in the pool's delicious hot tub. Relish a barbeque lunch alfresco and sip cocktails in the canopied lounge. Surrounding gardens of native plants and flowers including hibiscus, orchids, yellow palms, and jasmine engender an ambiance of tropical enchantment.Lovely doors open from the balcony to the interior living and dining room, where the high, vaulted ceilings and open plan create an exquisite space for evenings with family and friends. Sip aperitifs in the lounge, listening to your favorite tunes on the Sonos system, as your private chef prepares dinner in the fully equipped kitchen. Then gather around the gorgeous dining table for a Southeast Asian feast. At night, play pool in the charming parlor, or retire to the media room, where a 50-inch TV, Wii console, and well-stocked library of books, CDs, and DVDs, will keep adults and kids entertained.The villa features five fabulous bedrooms, four with king beds and one with two twins—providing ample space for families and destination wedding guests. All have ensuite bathrooms. The master suite and one of the king guestrooms open to the upper balcony, while the other two king bedrooms open to the ground-floor terrace. The master suite additionally has an alfresco shower.Beyond Kemala Villa, you're within minutes of some of the finest beaches and dining on Bali. Seminyak and Petitenget are both minutes away, as are Canggu Beach and Echo Beach. Nirwana Bali Golf Course is about twelve kilometers from your door.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Celebrating its beautiful beachfront location, Villa Gita Segara merges indoor and outdoor spaces seamlessly to create a unique atmosphere for an unforgettable Balinese vacation for a group of eight. The villa is nestled into a well-manicured coconut grove, making use of two separate pavilions linked by tropical gardens and the swimming pool to enhance the open-air environment. All four king en-suite bedrooms enjoy ocean views, as do the majority of Gita Segara’s indoor and outdoor common spaces. Nearby, you’ll find golf, water sports opportunities, quaint villages, and several more sandy beach areas.Gita Segara’s Main House is where you’ll find the fully equipped kitchen, formal dining area, and spacious air-conditioned living room, as well as the master bedroom and one more king en-suite. The Guest Pavillion is home to two more beautiful bedrooms. Segara’s interior is decorated in a stately, yet peaceful manner, with deep wood tones, elegant chandelier lighting, and designer furniture. On the terrace, you’ll love the mature palm trees that outline the swimming pool and lead the eye down towards the beachfront and ocean view. On the beach, you’ll love the small terrace, complete with sun loungers and a beach umbrella.Gita Segara comes with formal and alfresco dining settings with more than enough space for your whole group. The living room is outfitted with a Smart television, sound system, and a game console. And, you’ll surely appreciate the villa’s Wi-Fi, air conditioning, wine fridge, espresso machine, and dishwasher during your stay.If you feel like exploring the beach beyond your own private stretch of sand, you won’t have far to go before you find yourself on Candidasa, Bias Tugel, and Blue Lagoon beaches, all are within a few kilometers. For groceries, dining, and shopping, the small village of Candidasa is within walking distance of Gita Segara. And, if there’s a golfer in your group, Bali Beach Golf Course is one of the best in the country, with oceanside fairways and challenging course design.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Make the most of your Bali holiday with a stay at The Beji. This spacious vacation rental is a private retreat close to restaurants, the beach and the Canggu Club, and has a full staff to see to all your needs. Reserve this expansive luxury property and its six bedrooms for a family reunion, a getaway with a group of friends or even an intimate tropical destination wedding.Your stay includes the services of a villa manager, housekeeper, and chef. Of course, The Beji has its own verdant gardens with a pool, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, a tennis court and a scaled-down soccer field. Inside, you’ll find a cable TV, DVD player, sound system and Wi-Fi.Laid out as a series of pavilions around a lush lawn, the villa offers plenty of both communal and secluded space. The heart of the property is an elevated, open-air living room, where you can stretch out on the sofas while warm breezes waft through. The adjacent dining room has seating for twelve, and the nearby kitchen is fully equipped. There’s also a cozy media room upstairs where kids—or grown-ups—can unwind with a favorite movie.Each of the villa’s six bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy haven set in its own pavilion, and has an en-suite bathroom, terrace, and gorgeous details such as parquet floors. There are two master suites with king beds and semi-outdoor bathrooms to rival those at any spa, two bedrooms with queen beds and al-fresco showers, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each.The Beji is just a 10-minute walk from the Finns Recreation Club, which has everything from waterslides and trampolines to pilates and yoga. It’s also a short drive to great restaurants, popular beaches such as Berawa and Seminyak, as well as other sports facilities like the Bali Equestrian Center and the nearest golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This spectacular villa is perched above a pristine beach at the southernmost tip of Bali’s Buket Peninsula, with truly breathtaking views of the Indian Ocean. Situated within the private Asmara Estate, the villa is within walking distance of Timbis Cliffs and about five kilometers from Nusa Dua town. Resort-style features include a superb infinity pool, in-residence spa facilities, a game room, and a fabulous private staff including a talented chef. The three-story villa includes five bedroom suites—four with king beds, one with two twins—making it an ideal choice for destination wedding guests, large groups of friends, or unforgettable family reunions.The contemporary architectural masterwork balances top-of-the-line comforts with traditional Balinese influences, harmonizing beautifully with the timeless seaside setting. Multiple outdoor living areas form an ideal venue for festive occasions or serene relaxation in utter privacy. Relish a refreshing dip in the swimming pool and bask on comfortable sunbeds. Sip cocktails in the shaded pavilion and gather for alfresco meals in pergola, cooled by afternoon shadows or illuminated by beautiful lanterns.The terrace flows gracefully into the villa’s luminous interiors, where a superb guest kitchen serves a lovely open-plan living area with lounge and dining table overlooking the terrace and sea. The entertainment room with balcony is well appointed for nighttime fun, while the exquisite den inspires serene concentration. The lower floor includes the spa and fitness center, featuring a wide array of treatments and equipment to choose from.All five bedrooms enjoy ocean views and ensuite bathrooms. Each of the king suites opens to a private balcony, while the twin bedroom borders the terrace. The superb master suite features a jetted tub in its bathroom, and there are soaking tubs in the bathrooms attached to two of the guest suites.The beach beneath you is ideal for swimming and snorkeling, with a coral reef creating a safe sanctuary of gentle waters. Walk about half-kilometer to the paragliding at Timbis Cliff, or enjoy a chauffeured ride to Nusa Dua town or Bali National Golf Club. Families will enjoy Pirates Bay and Jimbaran Beach (famed for its seafood), while Uluwatu Temple offers a profound experience of Bali's spiritual heritage.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With its spacious Main House and six bedrooms, all of which open to the terrace, this Balinese rental feels more like a boutique resort, but Villa Naty is all yours. Inside Naty’s gated walls, you’ll enjoy immaculate tropical gardens and a serene atmosphere that is sure to melt stress away in an instant. Outside of Villa Naty’s estate, you’ll find yourself immersed in Balinese culture, situated amongst the traditional rice paddies and rolling hills on the outskirts of Seminyak. And, Villa Naty is just five kilometers from several public beaches and beach clubs.Villa Naty’s soothing white walls are decorated with Balinese art. Underneath high vaulted ceilings, you’ll find rich wood tones on flooring, furniture, and trim work. Throughout the open-air estate, you’ll feel at one with nature, thanks to Naty’s tropical gardens, water features, and numerous openings to the terrace.You may not notice at first, thanks to careful design, but Villa Naty is well-equipped with state of the art tech features, like Smart TVs, a media room, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth sound system, air conditioning, an exercise room, and a top of the line kitchen. On the terrace, you’ll love the relaxing hot tub, swimming pool, and lounge spaces. At Villa Naty, outdoor dining is a must. You can even prepare meals outside in the alfresco kitchen, which comes with a wood oven and a barbecue. And, the villa is staffed with a butler, housekeeper, chef, and security guard.If you’re in the mood to shop for souvenirs, dine at some of Bali’s most famous restaurants, or enjoy a day at the spa, Seminyak Square is the place to be. Just five kilometers from home, you’ll have no trouble enjoying downtown Seminyak’s beautiful environment and vibrant nightlife. If you’re traveling with children, Waterborn Bali waterpark in Kuta or Elephant Safari Park in Taro are both great afternoon excursions. And, when it’s time to head to the beach, you’ll find Seminyak, Echo, and Batubelig beaches, all within six kilometers of Villa Naty.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Surround yourself with water—and gorgeous waterfront views—at The Peninsula. This beautifully designed vacation rental is set along tranquil canals in a private residential enclave, but is only a 10-minute drive from downtown Noosa Heads and Sunshine Beach. Reserve its four bedrooms for a family getaway to the beach or a holiday in the Queensland sun with friends.Watch the sun sparkling on the water from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, hot tub, gas barbecue, wine fridge and al-fresco dining for eight. There’s also a boat ramp if you’d like to set off on an excursion, and shared access to a boat dock. After sunset, flip on the streaming TV or catch up with friends back at home via Wi-Fi.The villa’s thoughtful design allows guests the luxury of water views from nearly every room. Fold-away glass walls are all that separates the terrace from the living room, where louvered windows encourage the breeze, and a pair of sofas invite you to settle in by the TV. The adjacent dining area seats ten, and the fully equipped kitchen has a convenient breakfast bar.The Peninsula has one master suite with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and one bedroom with a queen bed that has access to hall bathroom. The other three bedrooms share a hall bathroom; two have two twin beds each and one has two twin bunk beds. The twin beds can be converted to king beds if desired.While you can set off from the villa by boat, it’s also easy to get around by car. It’s only a 10-minute drive from The Peninsula to shopping and dining in downtown Noosa Heads, and to Sunshine Beach, where you can kick off the day with a coffee at an oceanfront cafe, surf and tan to your heart’s content, and spend the evening reliving your honeymoon at a chic waterfront restaurant.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located on the southwestern coast of Bali, Indonesia’s exotic “Island of the Gods,” Villa Asta is an opulent five-bedroom residence with accommodations for ten lucky visitors. This island has no shortage of beaches, and Villa Asta is placed within walking distance of Batu Belig Beach, best known for its incomparable sunsets. The villa is situated on a tremendous private estate replete with various outdoor features so astonishing, some guests may wish to spend the entirety of their trip exploring and experiencing all that Villa Asta has to offer.The grounds feature badminton and volleyball courts, not to mention the billiards and table tennis tables as well. There are two different kinds of swimming pools to choose from, and koi ponds surrounded by beautifully manicured gardens will make you think you are in paradise. Indoors, the home has only the best in entertainment technology, total climate control and even massage beds. Designed by the internationally renowned architect Guy Morgan, the home is an amazing collection of boldly-colored walls and furniture, contrasted against a strong motif of contemporary elegance. The estate features both indoor and outdoor living and dining areas with long, immaculate sectional couches and dining tables that can seat fourteen. The kitchen comes fully equipped, though the chef will take care of most of the cooking in the adjacent service kitchen.Full en-suite bedrooms are spread across both the upper and lower floors. The three suites on the lower floor have two twin beds and private entry to the terrace. The master suites on the upper floor have four-poster king size beds, security safes and direct access to the plunge pool. The en-suite bathrooms are luxurious and are all alfresco, though walled gardens ensure complete privacy.Bali boasts some rare sights that could never be found anywhere else on the planet. The nearby town of Ubud features an ecological reserve known as Sacred Monkey Forest, which houses the precious Balinese long-tailed macaque. For breathtaking and inspirational sights, make sure to visit Pura Luhur Uluwatu, a Hindu Sea Temple placed at the edge of a cliff surrounded by the boundless sea.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Indulge yourself with a tranquil setting close to the beach, sophisticated style and warm Balinese hospitality at Villa Samuan. Beautifully appointed and fully staffed, this luxury vacation rental is close to the amenities of Seminyak, but set in a quiet residential neighborhood. It can be booked with two bedrooms, three bedrooms or the full five bedrooms, depending on the size of your group of friends or family.Nestled amid more than 17,000 square feet of lush tropical gardens, Villa Samuan feels like your own private oasis. It opens to a lovely courtyard with a pool, an array of loungers and sunbeds, a barbecue and an outdoor dining area. The property also features a spa room, cable TV, sound system and Wi-Fi. Your holiday includes airport transfers and daily breakfast, as well as the services of a cook, butler, villa manager and housekeeper.Villa Samuan is divided into the three-bedroom Villa Siki and the two-bedroom Villa Kalih. Each villa has incredible living spaces decorated in a unique East-meets-West style, with objets and artwork from around the globe displayed against wood-paneled walls. The high ceilings characteristic of Balinese architecture lend a breezy feel to the living and dining rooms, as do louvered doors opening to the terrace. Though your stay does include cook service, there is a fully equipped kitchen.Villa Siki is an ideal home away from home for a small family, while Villa Kalih is perfect for a couples’ getaway or even a honeymoon. Together, the two villas can welcome up to ten guests. Villa Siki has a master bedroom with a king bed and two bedrooms with queen beds, and Villa Kalih has one king bedroom and one queen bedroom. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Villa Samuan is a 9-minute walk from Seminyak Beach, a long stretch of white sand that’s home to several oceanfront restaurants, shops and galleries, and a 10-minute walk from the Seminyak Square shopping complex. The villa is only a short drive from many of the area’s other attractions, from other beaches to the Tanah Lot Sea Temple and Nirwana Bali Golf Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to the forests of Bali in luxury style at Villa Bayad Estate. Though it’s tucked into lush rice terraces, with views of the island’s sacred volcano, this Ubud vacation rental boasts design by a renowned architect and a full staff. Laid out as a compound, the four-bedroom property can accommodate up to eight friends or extended family in a combination of common and private spaces.Your holiday at Villa Bayad includes an airport transfer, daily breakfast, a twice-daily shuttle to Ubud and the services of a housekeeper and butler. Settle into the striking pool and watch the sun move across the vibrant landscape, indulge in a nap in one of the sun loungers on the terrace and finish the day with a meal from the barbecue at the al-fresco table. The villa also has amenities from an exercise room to a cable TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.Designed by Popo Danes, one of the most renowned architects in Southeast Asia, the villa is a stunning take on traditional Balinese style. In the main pavilion, a thatched roof, open-plan layout and several sets of French doors to the terrace lend a relaxed feel. The wicker seating area, dining table for ten and fully equipped kitchen are understated yet inviting.Flower-covered pergolas connect the four bedrooms to the main house. All four suites are honeymoon-worthy retreats with king beds and en-suite bathrooms; two of the bedrooms connect to the villa’s spa area, and two have their own al-fresco showers.From Villa Bayad Estate, it’s easy to visit the must-sees of Ubud, from its art museums to the market and royal palace. Animal lovers won’t want to miss a visit to the nearby Taro Elephant Safari Park or Bali Bird Park. For those craving sun and sand, popular beaches such as Echo and Kuta are within day-trip distance.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Just 20 minutes from the airport, you’ll find this tranquil getaway overlooking idyllic rice fields. Sitting on 5,300 square meters of landscaped gardens and close to the beach, this home blends classic Balinese architecture with modern accents and is one of our top villas in Bali. The Indonesian island of Bali is a popular holiday destination thanks to its spectacular beaches, rich landscape and unique culture.Spend a day lounging poolside on one of the cushioned chaise lounges under a sun umbrella, then enjoy some quiet time in the pool’s floating gazebo—it’s also a perfect spot for a massage. If you feel more like socializing, there’s a separate lounge bar with two adjoining terraces and a Bose sound system or grab one of the property’s mountain bikes and explore the area first hand.The open-sided living and dining area sits in a separate pavilion, and features comfy, colorful sofas and modern artwork that includes funky sculptures and Indonesian artifacts. You’ll also find a fully equipped kitchen in this space that is outfitted with all the appliances you need for a home-cooked meal—but you won’t need to lift a finger, there’s an on-site chef and butler service included in your stay. Enjoy meals in the upper-level dining area or out overlooking the pool.Up to 14 guests are able to comfortably stay the night in this estate. There are six dedicated bedrooms as well as a study that can be converted into an additional bedroom if needed. All rooms include en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, televisions with DVD players and small fridges, while the two master suites offer king size beds.As a guest at Chalina, you’ll be only 2 km to Echo beach, where you can sunbathe or try out surfing. It’s also 8 km to Tanah Lot Sea Temple, a major tourist attraction and Nirwana Bali Golf Club, considered to be one of the best in Asia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.An intoxicating sense of Balinese splendour runs through this palatial beachside manor. Guests can expect another level of comfort, with local culture flavoring the stunning decor. As morning breaks, gaze from bedroom balconies to the pool deck below, and explore grand hallways, spacious recreation spaces and an imperial kitchen / dining area. Fine beaches plus Cangu’s local delights are nearby.As morning sunlight flows through the windows of Villa Indrani, guests can appreciate the true beauty of this property. Stone ornaments and rich wooden surfaces abound through the villa, with breakfast being provided by the on-site chef via the beautifully-equipped kitchen. Get the day started right with a swim in the impressive pool, which is overlooked by a stunning example of bleached-wood art. The quality and taste behind the fixtures of the villa are clearly evident, and guests will appreciate the dark stone and cooling aspects of the property’s bathroom after a long day on one of the many nearby beaches. As evening draws in, wander the impressive, open corridors to take up a dream reading spot in the poolside recliners, as the scent of a gently cooking meal, made with fresh Balinese ingredients, drifts out along the well-maintained terrace.From Villa Indrani, guests have great access to the sunlit lanes, green fields, and most importantly, excellent beaches of this section of the Bali coast. Ideal for those keen on swimming and sunbathing, nearby Berawa Beach is ideal for those keen to take to the water, or even get their first surfing lessons. A short drive will also bring guests to the buzzing town of Seminyak, famous for its dining and shopping options, which makes a fine contrast to the quiet countryside in the villa’s vicinity.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Secluded amid lush tropical flora in the Canggu area of Southwest Bali, this contemporary masterpiece offers resort-style pleasures in total privacy. The design balances modernist, Bauhaus-inspired principles with rustic Balinese accents and an extraordinary collection of artwork ranging from Buddhist statuary to vibrant paintings embedded in natural stone. The surf breaks and authentic Balinese charm of Pererenan are less than 10 minutes away.The sprawling estate features numerous terraces and patios nestled oasis-like amid the luxuriant trees. Ample lounge areas in the sun and shade accompany the swimming pool and reflecting pool, while a dreamy pavilion with daybeds enjoys privacy below. The main living and dining area features an open-concept layout and sliding glass doors opening to the pool, which can be kept closed on hot afternoons to form a cool cocoon. The gourmet kitchen is fully equipped with high-end appliances, and guests have the option of hiring a private chef. Enchanting lighting and an outdoor cinema inspire long evenings under the stars.Villa Utopia enjoys an ideal balance of seclusion and proximity to some of the finest destinations in Bali. You’re about 15 kilometers from the boutique-lined streets and famous surf breaks of Seminyak, while the lesser-known surfer paradise of Pererenan is just minutes away. Echo Beach (less than 5 kilometers from your door) is also an outstanding spot for surfers and families alike. Enjoy a fun-filled day of waterslides, bowling, and tennis at Finn’s Recreation Club, or explore the majesty of local Balinese culture at Tanah Lot Temple. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this villa is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Villa Desa Roro Estate is an extraordinary private paradise in Canggu, Bali. Situated about a kilometer from Batubelig Beach, the estate offers an unparalleled balance of exclusive seclusion and prime location. Constisting of two distinct villas—two-bedroom Villa Desa Roro Dua and five-bedroom Villa Desa Roro—the property features two swimming pools, outstanding alfresco and interior living spaces, and seven fabulous bedroom suites. Traditional Javanese joglo design and spectacular décor evoke the finest elements of the traditional Indonesian and Southeast Asian luxury aesthetic. Superb spa and yoga amenities invite families and friends to a unique retreat in one of the most sublime settings in Indonesia.The beautifully landscaped estate features lush tropical coconut palms, colorful gardens, and verdant lawns. Two saltwater swimming pools, each twelve meters in length, are like twin lagoons in this tropical sanctuary. Savor exquisite days on the gorgeous wood pool deck, sunbathing and sipping cool drinks on elegant loungers. Practice yoga in the bale and enjoy afternoon refreshments on a sumptuous daybed.Each villa features a fabulous, open-plan great room with traditional joglo ceiling, as well as a fully equipped kitchen and dining table. Exquisite wood floors and ceiling beams, along with superb traditional artwork and furnishings, create the ideal setting for serene evenings and mornings in this enchanted forest. Outstanding AV equipment, a home theater, and an exercise room ensure total comfort during your stay.The two bedrooms in Villa Desa Roro Dua both feature king beds and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers. In Villa Desa Roro, there are three bedrooms with king beds and two with queens, distributed within three stand-alone pavilions. All of the bedrooms features ensuite bathrooms and air conditioning. The spectacular master suite, in its own pavilion, includes a walk-in closet, private lounge and spa areas, and a stand-alone rain shower and tub in its bathroom.Beyond the extraordinary privacy of your estate, you'll enjoy outstanding access to myriad riches of Bali. Several world-class beaches are within one to eight kilometers of your door, including Canggu, Petitegenet, Seminyak, and Echo. Seminyak Square is just five kilometers away, and the magnificent city of Ubud less than thirty. Golfers are an easy drive from Nirwana Bali.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get into the aloha spirit with friends and family at Champion Ridge 10. Stylish and private, this retreat overlooking the golf course has room for up to six guests and a location close to the Mauna Lani Resort and gorgeous Hapuna Beach—perfect for a warm-weather holiday or a trip to mark a special occasion.From the tranquil water feature at its entrance to its infinity pool with views of the fairways, this property sets a tone of calming luxury. Look beyond the course to the Kohala Mountains, the Pacific and Maui in the distance from the sitting area on the shaded lanai, a lounger on the sunny terrace or the hot tub. A barbecue makes it easy to try out fresh local seafood, while a media room, cable TV, sound system and Wi-Fi are ready to entertain in the evenings.The villa’s recently renovated interiors were designed by Hawaii-based Eric Henderson, and feature nods to vintage island style alongside more modern touches. An open-plan great room with sliding glass doors leading to the lanai makes the most of the gorgeous views, and the cream-and-turquoise sitting and dining areas are chic yet inviting. Granite countertops and a breakfast bar lend both style and substance to the fully equipped kitchen.The master suite at Champion Ridge 10 boasts a king bed, ensuite bathroom with a stone soaking tub and spectacular ocean and sunset views. The other two bedrooms each have king beds and ensuite bathrooms, plus private entrances that mean they could be used as honeymoon-style suites or quieter accommodations for in-laws.Guests of this Big Island vacation rental are welcome to use the golf course, tennis courts, spa and fitness center at the nearby Mauna Lani Resort, though some activities or treatments may be at extra cost. Tote the provided beach gear—including umbrellas, towels, snorkel equipment, a cooler and more—to the resort’s beach or stop by the shops for a selection of gourmet foods from sandwiches to freshly made sushi.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-058-055-6800-01STVR # 19-356735

listing.listing_description: Some of the finest materials from around the world came together to build this contemporary villa, but the beach views are signature Bali. Spot petrified wood, American oak, Italian Carrara marble, and Australian window treatments throughout the breezy open-concept interiors. Follow the steps down to the private beach and walk the black sands of Cemagi, or visit Seminyak and the Tanah Lot temple. Your holiday at this luxury property begins with an airport transfer and welcome drink, and includes chef, driver, and housekeeping services. When you’re not on the beach, there are inviting outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, lounging and dining areas, a barbecue, a ping-pong table, and a wet bar. In the evenings, a media room with a satellite TV and Wi-Fi are waiting to entertain indoors. This vacation rental was designed by French architect Fredo Taffin, who also envisioned chic Bali hot spot Ku De Ta, and much of its furniture was custom created by Detlev Hauth, a German designer now based in Indonesia. The international influence and local inspiration show in open-concept rooms, clean-lined furnishings, and fold-away glass walls that bring the landscape inside. The villa has four bedrooms with king beds—two with ocean views and two with their own terraces—and one bedroom with a queen bed. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and together they can accommodate groups of up to 10 friends or family. The house’s beachfront location in the Kecamatan Mengwi area is the perfect setting for a honeymoon-worthy stroll on the black volcanic sand. Try surfing the popular break at Echo Beach, tee off at top-ranked Nirwana Bali Golf Course, watch the sunset at Tanah Lot Sea Temple, and head into downtown Seminyak for an afternoon of shopping or evening drinks at one of its lively bars. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Glimpse classic Balinese style along with gorgeous ocean views at Villa Marie. Modeled on traditional compound-style homes, this six-bedroom vacation rental has sleek indoor-outdoor rooms that open to a beautifully appointed courtyard. A full staff and access to the shared amenities at the Pandawa Cliff Estate community ensure a holiday of pampered luxury.Your stay at Villa Marie includes the services of a private chef, housekeeper, butler and driver, as well as access to a shared gym, spa, and tennis and squash courts. Relax with family and friends in outdoor living areas with a pool, plenty of daybeds, al-fresco dining for six, and a barbecue, or entertain indoors with the help of the television, surround sound system and Wi-Fi.From the tranquil water feature in its garden to the ocean views from nearly every room, the villa shows thoughtful design that will make your stay a pleasure. Slide-away glass doors make the transition from the terrace to the great room nearly seamless, and an open-concept layout gives the living and dining areas a breezy, on-trend feel. While there is a fully equipped kitchen, the chef will be happy to prepare breakfast and other meals from a menu.Villa Marie has four bedrooms with king beds, including two master suites: one with an al-fresco shower and one that opens to its own ocean-view terrace. The other two bedrooms have two twin beds each. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.While it’s tempting to stay at the villa and unwind, it’s well worth exploring the nearby Bukit area. Make the short drive to the white sands of Pandawa Beach for a honeymoon-worthy stroll, seek out some of Bali’s best surf breaks at other nearby beaches, try the eateries in the town of Nusa Dua, tee off at New Kuta Golf Club and learn local lore at the sea temple at Uluwatu.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take in blue waves, green vegetation and serene surrounds at this east Bali villa, which offers an exceptional level of interior luxury. Awaken to bright, airy rooms with fine sea views, before relaxing on the rich stone terrace. The pool, rock-feature bathrooms, lush lawn and carved driftwood furniture give the home distinct character, with beaches, former palaces, and diving all nearby.Kick off your mornings at Villa Gumamela with a refreshing dive under the shining surface of the lengthy garden pool. Drying off at the poolside recliners, guests can take in the long horizons and peaceful waters of Amuk Bay. Turning inside, the home offers a marriage between rich Balinese touches and modern contemporary, with richly carved wooden featuring contrasting with open spaces and rich, golden light. The rockface decor of the bathrooms add a sense of tropical isolation, with the outdoor dining table, shaded under the terrace overhanging, is ideal for groups looking to take in the sunny environment along with delicious meals.Located in the quieter eastern side of the island, day trip options from Villa Gumamela are abundant. With scenic Mt Agung looking down, guests are minutes from popular beaches including Amed beach and sandy Perasi beach. Some of the best diving outings on the island are very close by, with sunken ships hosting fascinating marine life and corals in gorgeous blue water. The regal former palace at Ujung features networks of bridges, pools and gardens - a must-see for those interested in Bali’s unique heritage.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: One-eighty-degree views stretch beyond a 60-square-meter pool at this traditional villa perched atop Jimbaran Hill. The verdant Bali countryside unfurls in front of an open-sided living area designed by prominent Indonesian architect Popo Danes and overseen by a full staff. Do laps in your own pool or make the 10-minute drive to swim, surf, and dine on seafood at Jimbaran Beach. During your holiday at The Longhouse, a chef, butler, and housekeeper will pamper you, and you’ll have private access to boutique-hotel-worthy amenities from an infinity pool and yoga area to a barbecue and al-fresco wet bar. This luxury property also features a home gym and spa area, plus a smart TV, surround-sound system, and Wi-Fi. The living areas at this vacation rental are set in an open-sided pavilion with a traditional alang-alang roof. Reconnect with friends and family around a dining table for 14, or catch up on reading in one of the quiet lounge areas. Though chef service is included in your stay, the villa does have a fully equipped kitchen. The Longhouse has 3 bedrooms with king beds, including one that feels like a honeymoon suite with its al-fresco shower and plunge pool. There are also 2 bedrooms with 2 twin beds each, and one bedroom with a queen bed. All 6 bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. The villa’s location in the Kuta Selatan area gives you a taste of the real Bali. The closest town is Jimbaran, a 10-minute drive away, where you can spend a day on the white-sand beach, browse for the perfect souvenir in the shops, or join the locals in one of the many celebrations that still take place at the temple in front of the town’s market. For more restaurant options or a night out on the town, it’s a 30-minute drive to Seminyak. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Arnalaya means ‘rhythm of the waves’ in Sanskrit, and this chic retreat with its dream location seamlessly cultivates that illusive sense of harmony. This fabulous contemporary tropical retreat was brought to life by architect Sonny Chan and interior designer Albano Daminato. Arnalaya Beach House is a sophisticated yet supremely relaxed, family-friendly villa in Bali’s beautiful Canggu district, with a large team of staff on hand to ensure that every whim is gracefully met.From the Zen-like garden with steps and fish-filled lotus ponds to the mirage-like infinity swimming pool, every detail has been conceived to please your senses and relax your mind. An oceanfront garden pavilion offers alfresco seating, a built-in barbeque and dining for fourteen overlooking the Indian Ocean. The private tennis court is action ready and the spa pampers and polishes, while the lush gardens bowed with fragrant tropical flowers bring blissful repose. Little could be more restorative than a yoga session in this environment, on one of the platforms provided. The exteriors are all positioned to catch the magical sunrises and the Hindu rituals at the neighboring temple.The entertainment room is a real showstopper and will be a hotspot for the entire family. In a separate wing, along with three guest bedrooms, it has been equipped with a huge TV screen that connects to iTunes, plus stacks of games, books, arts and craft gear. Get ready for sundowners followed by exquisite meals prepared by Arnalaya’s master chef from a mouthwatering menu of Western and pan-Asian delicacies.Five immaculate bedrooms and additional bedding options accommodate up to fifteen guests at Arnalaya. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, walk-in closets, lounge areas, televisions and sound systems. The layout, with separate pavilions, is perfect for groups seeking oscillations of privacy and social time. All bedrooms have two twins that are convertible to kings, and the courtyard suite has an additional Murphy bed.Make use of the special-rate car and driver and visit some of Bali’s ethereal temples, grab a game of golf at the spectacular Nirwana course, or browse the boutiques of sophisticated Seminyak, just twenty minutes away. Life moves at a slower pace in nearby Canggu as many locals have largely agrarian lifestyles. Excitement is within arms reach however, starting with Echo Beach lined with warungs, small traditional restaurants, and excellent waves for surfing.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Welcome to your Maui dream home. Avalon by the Sea is a beautiful four-bedroom villa located in Kapalua, one of the most exclusive areas on the island. You’ll discover traditional Hawaiian design mixed with the finest contemporary amenities, surrounded by lush tropical gardens and majestic palms. The property sits on a bluff overlooking the 18th hole of the PGA Plantation Course, with sweeping views across manicured fairways to the rolling Pacific Ocean.Three separate lanai patios and an expansive tiled terrace surround the crisp turquoise water of the swimming pool. Start each morning with an invigorating dip before retreating to a cushioned chaise longue to bathe in the abundant island sun. Under one lanai you’ll find a high-end gas grill. Sizzle up fresh surf n’ turf and enjoy it around the alfresco dining table. As dusk settles, blend up delicious island cocktails and ease into the hot tub for a soak under the stars.Almost every room provides panoramic views. The open-plan main room houses the living and dining areas below a lofty ceiling. Light pours in through an invisible wall giving you full appreciation of the tasteful furnishings and colorful, contemporary art. In the living area, a soft wraparound sofa and armchairs with refined floral upholstery face a large flatscreen television. The elegant dining set is made of the most lovely dark wood and beautifully finished. The gourmet kitchen features deluxe appliances, natural stone surfaces and a cozy breakfast bar. Wi-Fi is accessible throughout the home.All four bedrooms are individually decorated with fine linens, beautiful furniture and every one features a stunning ocean view. Each is cooled by air conditioning and ceiling fans and houses its own well-appointed ensuite bathroom. The master bedroom is spacious and airy, with a King size bed, sitting area and beautiful antique desk. Its ensuite bathroom features premium fixtures including a long bathtub and shower.Guests of Avalon by the Sea will receive a 15% discount at The Bay Course and The PGA Plantation Course, the latter of which is a quick walk from the villa. Beaches, a fitness center and tennis courts are a five-minute drive away. Kapalua’s many white sand beaches are ideal for surfing or simply relaxing. The closest town is fifteen minutes by car, and there you can stock up on groceries, shop or dine.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Maui County License Number: BBWM 2009/2008HAWAII TAX ID #: W 40387426-01

listing.listing_description: Park Lane is an exquisite luxury condo less than two miles from Honolulu on the Hawaiian island of Oahu. It provides guests with beautiful private residences and outstanding communal amenities, including a swimming pool, hot tub, spa, fitness center, and ample alfresco living and dining areas. This eighth-floor courtyard residence includes two superb bedroom suites, an ample terrace with ocean views, and a superb open-concept interior, making it a perfect choice for small families or destination wedding guests. Situated on the ocean side of Ala Moana Shopping Center, this vacation rental is within ten minutes of Ala Moana Regional Park and just over a mile from Waikiki.The spacious terrace is ideal for savoring the delicious Pacific vistas over a bottle of fine wine, or cooking a barbecue lunch and relishing it alfresco in the exquisite breeze. Sliding glass doors open to the interior living area, allowing the ocean air to percolate throughout the home. Enjoy cocktails on the sumptuous sofa in the evening. Prepare dinners in the fully equipped kitchen and enjoy them together at the lovely table for six. At night, cuddle up in the media room with large TV.The master suite features a king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone tub and shower. High ceilings and tall corner windows with views of the ocean evoke feelings of luminous serenity. The guest suite includes a queen bed and access to a hallway bathroom. Each of the suites has a walk-in closet, air conditioning, ceiling fan, and television. The understated elegance of their decor echoes the precious natural beauty of the nearby shore. There is a sofa bed in the TV den to accommodate extra guests.Beyond your private residence, you'll enjoy Park Lane's deluxe amenities, including an expansive lawn with lounge furniture; a large swimming pool and hot tub; a well-equipped fitness center; and a spa. The outstanding outdoor kitchen, barbecue cabanas, Private Chef Dining Room, and Private Lounge/Bar Room are perfect for hosting large parties. You can also enjoy a lovely walk to the beach at Ala Moana, or drive less than two miles to Honolulu. Golfers are less than thirteen miles to Royal Hawaiian Golf Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-051-837-3376-01The property will be made exclusively available to the renter for a full period of 30-days and no one else may occupy the property during that period. listing.listing_description: Translated, “Sayang D’Amour” means “Sweet Love,” and you will find plenty to adore at this vacation getaway, one of our most opulent villas in Bali. With lush private gardens and grounds, it’s located just a stone’s throw from downtown Seminyak, an area known for its outstanding restaurants, nightlife and legendary sunsets.Indulge in a day of relaxation—the villa’s backyard will make you think you’re at your own private resort, thanks to colorful, cushy sun lounges with umbrellas, and a large pool. There’s a rooftop lounge surrounded by a landscaped tropical garden, perfect for evening drinks, or invite friends to join you for a formal alfresco dining. It’s also child-friendly with features like a splash pool and a custom-made cubby house for kids.Once you walk inside, you’ll notice the French owners’ careful attention to detail—they have painstakingly curated luxurious furnishings from around the world. The elegant living room features a splash of color mixed with natural wood accents, while the media room is cozy and inviting. The fully equipped kitchen comes with an industrial size 8-burner gas stovetop, juicer, and wine fridge, and, best of all, private chef services.Up to 12 guests can comfortably sleep in the villa’s six air conditioned bedrooms that are labeled with fun names like “French Kiss” and “Forever.” The master suite has a king-sized bed, daybed and writing desk, while three other rooms also boast king-sized beds and alfresco showers. The two remaining rooms feature two double beds each and ensuite bathrooms with bathtubs.Villa Sayang d’Amour is located in the heart of Seminyak. Explore diverse cuisine in the town’s high-end restaurants or spend time at one of its famous spas, boutiques and art galleries. Take advantage of your villa’s car and driver service and spend an afternoon at Echo Beach, just 7 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

There are 4 bedrooms inside; two ensuite and two with a shared bathroom.The Kokos Beach Houses provide a luxurious escape in self contained holiday houses.

listing.listing_description: With oceanfront views and surrounding greenery, a series of pavilions with antique “Joglo” architecture comprises this traditionally constructed villa. Occupying the edge of a lush escarpment, nothing but Bali’s unspoilt coast unfurls beyond, oozing peace and tranquility. Famous black-sand shores, coral reefs, and dolphin watching tours at Lovina Beach are mere minutes away by car. Floor-to-ceiling windows stretch the full length of walls, giving the illusion that you’re one with the outdoors. Statement pieces crafted from seashells alongside driftwood-inspired décor incorporate beachy elements into the open living space. Look up to find soaring wood ceilings with intricately carved beams that showcase historic designs. A gentle sea breeze keeps you cool, but when that’s not enough, a dip in the cyan-hued infinity pool is a refreshing option. The terrace looks directly out onto the dense, neighboring hilltops and is a scenic spot to watch the fiery sunset disappear behind the mountain vista. Experience the tranquility of rinsing off in the alfresco rain shower or soaking in the outdoor tub. Artfully crafted stone walls, lined with local shrubbery, in the front yard create a sense of total privacy while cliffs in the back drop off into palm-lined brush, allowing unobstructed viewing. Treat yourself to the deliciousness of an in-house chef to free up more of your time for exploring nearby hot spots; Banjar Hot Springs, Beji Temple, and Busungbiu Rice Terraces are just a few day trip options. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Palm trees and lush tropical greenery line the patio of this luxurious three-bedroom villa in the Wailea Beach Residence, creating a secluded environment that is are to relax and rejuvenate you and your guests. With the seclusion of a private residence and the amenities of a beachfront resort, Wailea is ideal for those who appreciate their attractions within walking distance. And, with golf, beachfront, shops, and restaurants so close, you’ll have no trouble making the most of your next amazing Luxury Retreats vacation.From the expertly manicured lawn and garden to the rugged stone archway of the terrace, and on to the spacious living room, Wailea flows seamlessly. Inviting fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight into interior spaces is an important part of an authentic Hawaiian vacation, and with a Wailea’s open-air layout, this villa pulls it off with ease. Inside, rich wood textures, floral prints, and high-end electronics decorate the open-concept living area. In the kitchen, you’ll find granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and an inviting breakfast bar.On Wailea’s beautiful estate it’s easy to keep up with daily routines and experience the best of Hawaii’s laid-back island lifestyle. Keep up with your daily regiment in the fitness center, or you could trade the treadmill for a run along the sandy beachfront. After, cool off in the villa’s plunge pool, or make your way to one of Wailea’s shared pool and hot tubs.Nearby, there are several more luxury resorts lining the coast of Maui, and Wailea provides a shuttle service so guests can enjoy some of the other beachfront clubs, bars, and restaurants in the area. The Wailea Blue golf course is also quite close, and a must-play for any golf aficionados in your group. Designed to embrace the natural characteristics of Hawaii, the Blue course enjoys scenic ocean, island, and volcano views from its many peaks and valleys.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: 167-359-2832-01

listing.listing_description: A marriage of modern design and the grand tradition of Hawaiian lodges, this seaside villa offers a peaceful getaway on Hawaii’s west coast. Beside a sheltered, sandy beach, guests can take in blazing sunsets from expansive grounds and tiered terraces. With creative interiors and decor, as well as no expenses-spared comfort, dramatic beaches and Hapuna Beach State Park are just a short drive away.Kahieluana has been custom-built with taking in the island’s fiery sunsets in mind. Guests are able to do so from the nearby sheltered black sand beach, or with a drink in hand from one of the coastal mansion’s several balconies. The home’s slatted wooden exterior casts dreamy shadows over the luxuriously outfitted living room, where towering green foliage covers one wall, while the cheerful and colorful bathrooms are a joy to luxuriate in after a long beach day. Sunlit walkways and the sand and palm trees that sit alongside the shimmering pool add a sense of tropical peace to this home.Set in the dynamic western coast of the Hawaii Islands’ largest island, the landscape around Kahieluana is dominated by the Pacific Ocean. Go for evening strolls and bike rides along nearby winding lanes and roads, with the sea breeze blowing softly through the rocky landscape. Guests can swim with turtles on one of the several excellent nearby beaches, including Hapuna Beach, a renowned surfing spot and natural park, while a number of established golf courses are also conveniently close by. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Hawaii Tax ID #: GE-189-391-9232-01 TA-189-391-9232-01STVR-19-354401

listing.listing_description: Shaded decks make it easy to keep your cool at this recently renovated modern home within walking distance of Sunshine Beach village. Fold-away glass walls and railings offer seamless views, while inside, colorful surf-themed artwork punctuates crisp white open-concept rooms. Walk into town for a dip on the lifeguard-patrolled beach, then perch on the surf-club deck and spot dolphins over a drink.Make the most of the area’s namesake sunshine in outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, lounging and dining areas, and a gas barbecue, all kept private by walls and bamboo plantings. There’s a smart TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi to keep friends and family busy in the evenings, as well as a telescope for a little old-school entertainment.A fold-away glass wall connects the great room to the outdoor dining area at this vacation rental, while louvered windows let the cool sea breezes circulate around the open-concept space. White walls and wood floors are a neutral backdrop for colorful paintings and surf-themed accents in the sitting area, a dining area for 10, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.This luxury property has one master bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, as well as two bedrooms with queen beds that share a hall bathroom. A fourth queen bedroom shares a hall bathroom with a bedroom that has two twin beds.An on-call manager and concierge are on hand should you need anything during your holiday. But it’s easy to walk from the villa into downtown Sunshine Beach, where there’s a beach with lifeguards along with one-of-a-kind boutiques, cafés tapping into the Australian obsession with coffee, and restaurants where you can relive your honeymoon over a great meal. It’s also less than a 5-minute drive to the equally trendy center of Noosa Heads.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Trijitrap is a stunning luxury villa in Seminyak, on the Indonesian Island of Bali. Designed to modernize the classic grandeur of the Javanese plantation house called "Huis Tijtrap," the result is the ideal sanctuary for large families, groups of friends, or destination wedding guests seeking privacy and spiritual tranquility during a Balinese adventure.The villa's beautifully symmetrical design features a central, open-air pavilion that overlooks the swimming pool and transports you back in time. The wooden pool deck, punctuated by tall palms, is perfect for spending long afternoons in the tropical sun. In the pavilion, high, vaulted ceilings cover a deluxe lounge, where you'll sip cocktails together in the evening. Verandas flank the pavilion on both the ground and upper floors. The property is nestled in lush garden and is beautifully illuminated at night.From the pavilion, you'll pass into the villa's open-plan interior living area. Here, you'll dine at the beautiful table for twelve, or relax in the lounge beside the delightful atrium, with its bust of the Buddha and tranquil pool—a soothing core emitting peace throughout the home. The décor throughout is elegantly minimalist, with exquisite touches of traditional Javanese influence inflecting the fresh, luminous, contemporary feel.All six bedrooms have king beds and ensuite bathrooms. The two master suites, on the upper floor of the main house, open to the veranda. The first includes its own sumptuous living lounge, while the second is adjacent to the upstairs TV den. The master bathrooms feature stand-alone showers and bathtubs. There are two bedrooms on the ground floor of the main house opening to the lower veranda, and two in the guesthouse opening to lovely stepping-stone paths to the pool. One of these last rooms, in addition to its king bed, includes two elevated twin beds, making for a charming family suite. The four last rooms feature alfresco stand-alone showers and bathtubs.From Villa Tjitrap, Seminyak Beach is just a thirteen-minute walk from your door, and several other beaches are a short drive away. Families with kids will love the Splash Waterpark at Finns Recreation Club or a day at Waterbom Bali. And for an unforgettable experience of Bali's natural and spiritual beauty, visit Tanah Lot Sea Temple.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
